item.title: Chasm Network Scout Season 0 Hosting Tutorial
item.description: In this guide, I will walk you through the process of running Chasm Scout in Season 0 using Digital Ocean. Please note that you should always refer to the Official Guide from Chasm Network for the most up-to-date information. We’ve chosen Digital Ocean for two main reasons: It’s easy to use, especially for those new to cloud services. Unlike AWS or GCP, it doesn’t require going through a complex DevOps process.
